adventures.name: Basic Rafting
adventures.services: Includes complimentary insulated bottle ($20 value), transportation to and from the river, rafting equipment and guides.

adventures.name: Canoeing
adventures.services: Includes guided tour and canoe rental.

adventures.name: Kayaking
adventures.services: Includes kayak and equipment rental, and a map upon request.

adventures.name: Overnight Rafting
adventures.services: Includes basic rafting plus gear for hiking, camping, and meals.

adventures.name: Rock Climbing
adventures.services: Includes instruction, equipment, admission and return visit.

adventures.name: Paintball
adventures.services: Includes field fees and all day air, paintball marker, face/goggles, tank, hopper, and 500 paintballs (2000 paintballs for an additional $30).
